diamond.util.graphics.complexion

Class Complexion

  • java.lang.Object
    • diamond.util.graphics.complexion.Complexion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Template
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Node, Terrain

    public abstract class Complexion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Template
    Klasse zur Darstellung von bestimmten Objekten Ermoeglicht Texturen, Materialen, Farben und Shader
    Version:
    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
